job.command: cd ${SUBMITTINGDIRECTORY} setenv STARFPE NO setup nodebug source /afs/rhic.bnl.gov/star/packages/.DEV2/setupDEV2.csh setup cvmfs setup gcc starver TFG24c set year = `GetYearFromPWD.pl` set mu = ${INPUTFILE0} set dir = `dirname ${mu}` set muB = `basename ${mu}` cd ${dir} set picoD = `echo ${muB} | sed -e 's/Mu/pico/'` if (-r ${picoD}) exit 0; root.exe -q -q -x 'lMuDst.C(-1,"'${muB}'","RMuDst,mysql,magF,nodefault,picoWrite,PicoVtxDefault,quiet,PicoVtxFXT,FXT")' 'makePicoDst.C("y'${year}'")' >& ${picoD}.log
